Articles.Content:
The title says it all. If you found a Kerman whose name is odd, funny, or looks cool, post a picture of him here!

I\'ll start. I present to you: Danger Kerman

Smile for the camera!

I did multiple double-takes when I saw him!

...RIP Merman. He was unfortunate enough to appear during a testing phase for under-hull engines. Backflips ensued until his crew was brutally murdered by Zn1337666.
